subject: Sailboats and Sailing
America's Cup
lead_paragraph: Franck Cammas, holder of the round-the-world sailing record and adviser to the America's Cup-winning Oracle team, is casting one of the biggest shadows in the sport at the moment.
snippet: Franck Cammas, holder of the round-the-world sailing record and adviser to the America's Cup-winning Oracle team, is casting one of the biggest shadows in the sport at the moment.
